Instruction: Combine egg yolks, cream, salt, sugar, and butter in a bowl. Gradually mix in the flour until the dough reaches a consistency that allows it to be rolled out smoothly.
Roll out the dough very thinly and cut it into triangles. Optional: Make a small slit in the middle of each triangle and twist one corner through the opening for a decorative touch.
Fry pizzelle batter in hot oil until light brown. Drain excess oil and sprinkle with confectioner's sugar before serving.

The nutritional value of oil for frying in this recipe is based on a retention value of 10% post-cooking. Actual amounts may vary based on factors such as cooking time, temperature, ingredient density, and type of oil used.
